name: Stufato di carne e verdure sospetto
desc: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.

value.text: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Ricetta: stufato di carne e verdure
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cream Stew.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Panna
value.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

value.name: Bocca di leone
value.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

value.name: Stufato di carne e verdure delizioso
value.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.

value.name: Stufato di carne e verdure
value.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
